input.heading: Input data
input.description: Data uploaded by the user which describes entity attributes and flags

network_table.heading: Network table
network_table.description: A table of entity networks detected in the input data

entity_table.heading: Entity table
entity_table.description: A table of entity networks detected in the input data, broken down by entity

example.heading: Entity reports
example.description: Reports generated for selected entity networks, assessing entity relationships and the potential for flag exposure
